mainText:
Steve Jobs  
was a remarkable human being - a spirit of incredible intellect and  
creativity. He left the world a better, more inspired place in which  
to live as well as a legacy to live up to.

I send warm healing energy to those close to him and a hope to all  
that we can continue to uphold his legacy of an unwavering commitment  
to excellence in all that we do.
author: Janette
